items.question: How does the 14-day free trial work?
items.answer: You can use all Pro features of Tracksy for 14 days without any restrictions. No credit card is required to start. At the end of the trial period, you can choose the paid Pro plan or continue with the limited free plan.

items.question: What's the difference between the Free and Pro plan?
items.answer: The Free plan includes 1 client, 3 projects and basic features. The Pro plan at $9 USD/month offers unlimited clients and projects, advanced reports, clean PDF exports and priority support.

items.question: Is Tracksy suitable for Quebec freelancers?
items.answer: Absolutely! Tracksy is designed specifically for the Quebec market with local tax support (GST/QST), billing in Canadian dollars, and compliance with Quebec tax regulations.

items.question: How does automatic billing work?
items.answer: Tracksy automatically generates your invoices based on recorded time and your hourly rates. You can customize templates, add additional fees, and send invoices directly from the application.

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Security is our priority. All your data is encrypted in transit and at rest, hosted on Canadian servers, and we comply with all Canadian data protection laws.

items.question: Is there a mobile app?
items.answer: The Tracksy mobile app is in development and will be available soon on iOS and Android. In the meantime, our web interface is fully responsive and works perfectly on mobile.
